sentences.sContent: As previously mentioned, the main thing this renderer does is decode input and encode output.
sentences.sContent_eng: As previously mentioned, the main thing this renderer does is decode input and encode output.
sentences.sCn: 正如前面提到的，渲染器做的主要工作就是解码输入和编码输出。

sentences.sContent: Decoder - This feature can be used to decode data to get back the original form, or to encode and encrypt data.
sentences.sContent_eng: Decoder - This feature can be used to decode data to get back the original form, or to encode and encrypt data.
sentences.sCn: 这个特性用来解码数据，从而得到数据的原始形式。或者用来编码和加密数据。

sentences.sContent: Obviously, if you wanted to encode and decode in some other format, I would suggest extending the input and output stream.
sentences.sContent_eng: Obviously, if you wanted to encode and decode in some other format, I would suggest extending the input and output stream.
sentences.sCn: 如果您希望以其他格式进行编码和解码，我建议您继承输入和输出流，这是很自然的事情。

remMethod.val: en + code(电码， 密码) → 译码

trans.tranOther: to put a message or other information into code
